pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, February 8, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, February 8, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of the Yukon, Sandy Silver.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
